summary: The film is seen through the eyes of a ten-year-old boy, Harry (Matías del Pozo), who does not know that Argentina's 1976 coup d'état is impacting his life. After witnessing the "... See full summary »
cast: Ricardo Darín|Cecilia Roth|Héctor Alterio|Fernanda Mistral|Tomás Fonzi|Mónica Scapparone|Milton De La Canal|Matías Del Pozo|Evelyn Domínguez|Leticia Brédice|Nicolás Cantafio|Gabriel Galíndez|María Socas|Juan Carrasco|Demián Bugallo|Oscar Ferrigno Jr.|Alberto Silva
title: Kamchatka
